name: Paint IT!
description:
Do you ever play Crash Bash Pogo level? Yes the game is simple like that, but with different scoring method. Score will achieved after you paint the floor and leave it for 8 seconds. However you can't claim the score if other player / bot paint your floor 

Control 
Player 1 : Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow
Player 2 : A, S, Q, W 
Player 3 : K, L, I, O
Player 4 : 1, 2, 4, 5 (NUMPAD)

#Update Game Pad Controller Support (Works on Windows, Html not working, Linux haven't tested)

Have fun with your friend!!

This game created with godot alpha build, error might be happen sometimes, don't be scared! 

Known error :
Windows : when closing the game, will stop processing
HTML : Audio not working, joypad not working
Linux : N/A
